name: HeyCharge
headline: Low-cost, high-scale EV charging platform for apartments (and more).
description: EV charging infrastructure today is expensive, difficult to install, and doesn't integrate well with existing products, services, and businesses. HeyCharge solves all of these problems with ultra-low-cost, plug-and-play EV chargers that don't require internet connections and integrate with third-party products via our SDK and APIs. Our customers are energy utilities, property operators, mobility service providers, and more.

founders.name: Chris Carde, Founder
founders.description: Experience at Google, Mercedes-Benz, E.ON Energy, and at the UC Davis Hybrid Electric Vehicle Center. Experienced product and engineering leader and executive. I love dogs. And airplanes.

founders.name: Robert Lasowski, Founder
founders.description: From the very beginning of my career in 2005, I have been in charge to deliver end-to-end innovations around connected, shared and electric mobility. Being responsible for designing mobility concepts, assessing latest technology trends, and creating long-term go-to-market strategies within the smart mobility eco-system got me excited to start an own venture. And here I am - really happy to be part of HeyCharge’s journey!

## Next wave of EV charging is coming! Connectivity will play a major role resulting in major challenges:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/611987cdf775d15cb10cab18/6398dc8b255ee6b3b384b182_solutions%20bg.svg)
### Low reliability
Most charging infrastructure is not well suited for underground environments or areas with bad internet connection. The result is a highly unreliable charging network that is expensive to operate and comes with a low user satisfaction. With HeyCharge this is different: all time critical transactions will be performed immediately - no more waiting, no more frustration.
[Learn more](https://heycharge.com/<https:/www.heycharge.com/technology>)
### High cost
Installation and operation of smart charging networks can be pretty expensive due to high labor cost and long installation process. With HeyCharge you don't need special trained installers. Every electrician can do it. Also we significantly reduce the installation time and set you up for a fast scaling business.
[Learn more](https://heycharge.com/<https:/www.heycharge.com/technology>)
### High complexity 
Today planning, setup and operations of smart chargers is a big challenge for installers and operators of charging networks. HeyCharge reduces the complexity on all levels by enabling an easy and standardized approach.
[Learn more](https://heycharge.com/<https:/www.heycharge.com/technology>)
### How HeyCharge can help solving these challenges?
In a nutshell - HeyCharge is a hardware enabled SaaS platform that enables simplicity all around EV-charging including user experience, installation and operations. Our technology allows building highly scalable and profitable charging networks in low connectivity environments. Exactly what is needed in the upcoming years!Do you want to learn more or discuss how we can help you grow your business?

## HeyCharge technology provides multiple benefits to solve future EV-charging challenges by offering:
## Perfect USER Expercience
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/611987cdf775d15cb10cab18/634fa435d369cb3c240b402a_Perfect%20experience.png)
Today’s smart charging infrastructure is not very well suited for underground environments. This is because it relies on a permanent internet connection to the charger and also on the user’s smartphone having a mobile network signal. That fact drives the cost of hardware, installations and operations and also often leads to bad user experience when no network coverage is available.
At HeyCharge we are dedicated to build the best in class user experience based on a full digital process. No RFID cards - just the HeyCharge app enables simple usage and provides full cost transparency.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/611987cdf775d15cb10cab18/634fb9b7df9f127e18b93cad_link%20arrow.svg)](https://heycharge.com/<#>)
## Integrated billing
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/611987cdf775d15cb10cab18/634fa436f22c3bcd831ec8f4_Integrated%20billing.png)
Using the integrated HeyCharge billing functionality you can significantly reduce the operations efforts of your facility managers and asset managers. Individual energy consumption is invoiced via the HeyCharge backend directly to the user. Access control to selected chargers can be granted within seconds. ia the HeyCharge management portal. You receive the exact overview of the consumed energy amount of the individual users. The recorded energy consumption can be settled directly with the user for a defined period.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/611987cdf775d15cb10cab18/634fb9b7df9f127e18b93cad_link%20arrow.svg)](https://heycharge.com/<#>)
## integrated load Management 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/611987cdf775d15cb10cab18/645f4c4c3b5356316885fa4c_Bildschirmfoto%202023-05-13%20um%2009.37.04.png)
Our integrated load management feature becomes essential when demand for EV charging grows faster than the power capacity within a building. As soon as a certain power limit is reached, the HeyCharge charging network will optimizes itself and will find the perfect balance for every power demand situation.
The communication between the chargers is based on a reliable wireless ZigBee communication and integrates the load management feature itself directly on the HeyCharge wallbox. This eliminates the need for external management hardware and decreases installation complexity, efforts and costs. 
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/611987cdf775d15cb10cab18/634fb9b7df9f127e18b93cad_link%20arrow.svg)](https://heycharge.com/<#>)

## Next wave of EV charging is coming! Connectivity will play a major role resulting in major challenges:
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/611987cdf775d15cb10cab18/6398dc8b255ee6b3b384b182_solutions%20bg.svg)
### Low reliability
Most charging infrastructure is not well suited for underground environments or areas with bad internet connection. The result is a highly unreliable charging network that is expensive to operate and comes with a low user satisfaction. With HeyCharge this is different: all time critical transactions will be performed immediately - no more waiting, no more frustration.
Learn more⟨15⟩
### High cost
Installation and operation of smart charging networks can be pretty expensive due to high labor cost and long installation process. With HeyCharge you don't need special trained installers. Every electrician can do it. Also we significantly reduce the installation time and set you up for a fast scaling business.
Learn more⟨15⟩
### High complexity 
Today planning, setup and operations of smart chargers is a big challenge for installers and operators of charging networks. HeyCharge reduces the complexity on all levels by enabling an easy and standardized approach.
Learn more⟨15⟩
### How HeyCharge can help solving these challenges?
In a nutshell - HeyCharge is a hardware enabled SaaS platform that enables simplicity all around EV-charging including user experience, installation and operations. Our technology allows building highly scalable and profitable charging networks in low connectivity environments. Exactly what is needed in the upcoming years!Do you want to learn more or discuss how we can help you grow your business?

With the SecureCharge Module you receive the patent-pending SecureCharge technology - no internet connection required anymore.

## HeyCharge technology provides multiple benefits to solve future EV-charging challenges by offering:
## Perfect USER Expercience
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/611987cdf775d15cb10cab18/634fa435d369cb3c240b402a_Perfect%20experience.png)
Today’s smart charging infrastructure is not very well suited for underground environments. This is because it relies on a permanent internet connection to the charger and also on the user’s smartphone having a mobile network signal. That fact drives the cost of hardware, installations and operations and also often leads to bad user experience when no network coverage is available.
At HeyCharge we are dedicated to build the best in class user experience based on a full digital process. No RFID cards - just the HeyCharge app enables simple usage and provides full cost transparency.
Learn more![⟨19⟩](https://heycharge.com/<#>)
## Integrated billing
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/611987cdf775d15cb10cab18/634fa436f22c3bcd831ec8f4_Integrated%20billing.png)
Using the integrated HeyCharge billing functionality you can significantly reduce the operations efforts of your facility managers and asset managers. Individual energy consumption is invoiced via the HeyCharge backend directly to the user. Access control to selected chargers can be granted within seconds. ia the HeyCharge management portal. You receive the exact overview of the consumed energy amount of the individual users. The recorded energy consumption can be settled directly with the user for a defined period.
Learn more![⟨19⟩](https://heycharge.com/<#>)
## integrated load Management 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/611987cdf775d15cb10cab18/645f4c4c3b5356316885fa4c_Bildschirmfoto%202023-05-13%20um%2009.37.04.png)
Our integrated load management feature becomes essential when demand for EV charging grows faster than the power capacity within a building. As soon as a certain power limit is reached, the HeyCharge charging network will optimizes itself and will find the perfect balance for every power demand situation.
The communication between the chargers is based on a reliable wireless ZigBee communication and integrates the load management feature itself directly on the HeyCharge wallbox. This eliminates the need for external management hardware and decreases installation complexity, efforts and costs. 
Learn more![⟨19⟩](https://heycharge.com/<#>)

generated_description:
HeyCharge is a Munich-based startup focused on creating low-cost, high-scale electric vehicle (EV) charging platforms for residential apartments and other locations. Founded in 2020, the company is part of Y Combinator's S21 batch and features a dedicated team of 17 professionals.

The crux of HeyCharge's innovation lies in its ultra-low-cost, plug-and-play EV chargers, which steer clear of expensive installations and complex setups. These chargers work without an internet connection, a game changer for areas with poor connectivity. By integrating seamlessly with third-party products through their API and SDK, HeyCharge makes EV charging not only accessible but also efficient for property operators, energy utilities, and mobility service providers.

### Key Features:
- **Simplicity and Cost Efficiency:** Installation can be performed by any trained electrician, thus significantly reducing labor costs and installation times. This makes it easier for businesses to expand their charging networks rapidly.
- **Low Connectivity Operation:** Unlike traditional systems, HeyCharge's technology does not rely on continuous internet access, ensuring that customers can charge reliably in areas where connectivity is unreliable.
- **Integrated Billing and User Experience:** Their platform offers a user-friendly experience with integrated billing systems that streamline operations for facility managers. Users can access energy consumption details directly through the HeyCharge app, eliminating the need for physical cards.

### Current Developments:
HeyCharge has attracted attention for its impactful technology and partnerships. One notable collaboration includes a venture with Vonovia, Europe’s largest residential real estate company, aimed at delivering affordable EV charging solutions across Germany.

In a world rapidly shifting toward electrification, HeyCharge is poised to solve pressing challenges in the EV infrastructure space. By focusing on reliability, cost reduction, and ease of use, they are effectively addressing the pain points that have hindered broader adoption of EV charging solutions.

If you're interested in exploring more, you can visit [HeyCharge's website](https://heycharge.com/).
